name: School/community-based management waiver
text: A school or a learning support center participating in the school/community-based management program may initiate a waiver from policies, rules, or procedures, including collective bargaining agreements, as provided for in section 302A-1126. [L 1993, c 364, pt of §11; am L 1994, c 272, §23; am L 1996, c 89, §6]     Schools; waiver of policies, rules, or procedures.  [Section effective July 1, 2005.  For section effective until June 30, 2005, see above.]  Any school may initiate a waiver from policies, rules, or procedures, including collective bargaining agreements, as provided for in section 302A-1126. [L 1993, c 364, pt of §11; am L 1994, c 272, §23; am L 1996, c 89, §6; am L 2004, c 51, §21]
